title: Marketing & Sales Enablement Specialist (Remote)
job_overview:
Are you a strategic marketer who understands how great marketing empowers sales? Do you enjoy jumping into fast-moving environments where your creativity and attention to detail make an immediate difference? If so, we’d love to work with you.

We’re looking for a Marketing & Sales Enablement Specialist to help drive marketing initiatives across two closely connected businesses in the building materials sector. This fully remote role will have a special focus on reenergizing our brand while supporting ongoing marketing efforts in Milwaukee. You’ll be key in building visibility, enabling the sales team, and making sure our message hits the right audience, in the right way, at the right time.

What You’ll Be Doing
Marketing Execution:
Refresh and tailor marketing playbooks and materials for both Minneapolis and Milwaukee markets.
Coordinate closely with our external agency to align on brand strategy and execution.
Support showroom efforts—help run local campaigns, prep for events, and create branded collateral.
Design or enhance visuals using Canva (or a similar tool) to support both sales and marketing.
Keep a pulse on our social media presence—especially B2B engagement and inbound leads.

Sales Enablement
Work side-by-side with the sales team to update leave-behinds, presentations, and other collateral.
Help activate localized go-to-market strategies like newsletters, showroom promotions, and email outreach.
Track showroom performance and conversion rates to refine what’s working and what needs adjusting.
Play a role in Account-Based Marketing (ABM)—helping us reach key decision-makers like builders, designers, and remodelers.

What We’re Looking For
Comfortable designing in Canva or similar platforms—quickly creating clean, branded materials.
Solid understanding of B2B marketing—ideally within the construction, design, or home improvement space.
Familiar with ABM strategies and how to execute targeted outreach.
Hands-on experience with CRM platforms like HubSpot or Salesforce for tracking leads and activity.
Strong writing chops—able to craft or polish content for emails, sales materials, and outreach campaigns.
Proactive, resourceful, and able to thrive in a fast-paced environment where things aren’t always fully mapped out.
A true team player—someone who takes ownership, collaborates well, and knows how to move things forward.

Company Benefits:
$500 USD Sign-In Bonus if you apply between July 10 to September 25, 2025
Competitive compensation package
Opportunity to work closely with high-level executives from various industries.
Professional growth and development.
Chance to contribute to the success and growth of our clients.
Supportive and collaborative team environment.
Paid US Federal Holidays
Paid Time Off
Healthcare Package
1 Year Travel Bonus
Year-End Bonus

How to Apply:
1. Complete the Form: Start by filling out the form at wkf.ms/3AnjFVK.
2. Video Recording: Ensure you have a professional background when recording your video.
3. Be Authentic: We strongly discourage reading from a script. Instead, be genuine and let your personality shine!
4. Email Confirmation: Make sure to provide a valid email address to receive our application confirmation. If you don’t see the confirmation email, double-check for any spelling errors and resubmit the form with the correct email.
5. Next Steps: If your qualifications meet our criteria, our Recruitment Specialist will reach out to you.
